TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewSelectionMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: Descreve como as células de um controle DataGridView podem ser selecionadas.

span.span: Describes how cells of a DataGridView control can be selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Essa enumeração é usada para definir o propriedade de um controle.This enumeration is used to set the property of a control. ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra o uso desse tipo.The following code example illustrates the use of this type. Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: definir o modo de seleção do controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-the-selection-mode-of-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).For more information, see [How to: Set the Selection Mode of the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-the-selection-mode-of-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#065](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#065)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#065](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#065)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode CellSelect = int32(0)

summary.span: É possível selecionar uma ou mais células individuais.

span.span: One or more individual cells can be selected.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode ColumnHeaderSelect = int32(4)

summary.span: A coluna será selecionada clicando na célula de cabeçalho da coluna.

span.span: The column will be selected by clicking in the column's header cell.

summary.span: Uma célula individual pode ser selecionada clicando nessa célula.

span.span: An individual cell can be selected by clicking that cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode FullColumnSelect = int32(2)

summary.span: A coluna inteira será selecionada clicando no cabeçalho da coluna ou em uma célula contida naquela coluna.

span.span: The entire column will be selected by clicking the column's header or a cell contained in that column.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode FullRowSelect = int32(1)

summary.span: A linha inteira será selecionada clicando no cabeçalho da linha ou em uma célula contida naquela linha.

span.span: The entire row will be selected by clicking its row's header or a cell contained in that row.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode RowHeaderSelect = int32(3)

summary.span: A linha será selecionada clicando na célula de cabeçalho da linha.

span.span: The row will be selected by clicking in the row's header cell.

summary.span: Uma célula individual pode ser selecionada clicando nessa célula.

span.span: An individual cell can be selected by clicking that cell.
